channel.title: Comments on: Who Was Cele Goldsmith?
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Tommy
item.dc:creator: Tommy
item.description: I found this article after listening to the short story "what is this thing called love" by Isaac Asimov. He referenced her by name in the forward as "needed to have been seen to be believed". Thanks for writing this. I enjoyed the info.
item.content:encoded: I found this article after listening to the short story “what is this thing called love” by Isaac Asimov. He referenced her by name in the forward as “needed to have been seen to be believed”. Thanks for writing this. I enjoyed the info.
